title: Bloomberg Markets: Bowdoin Building a Community on Campus
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Bowdoin Building a Community on Campus
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Whitney Soule\u0010Dean of Admissions \u0010Bowdoin College\u0010Discussing how "character and kindness" pertain to the college applicant pool. Bloomberg News Higher Education Reporter Janet Lorin also participates in the conversation.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
